body_html:
I'm sure that Debian will have at least CUDA7.5+ and Caffe officially in this year (before or within Q2) but not sure for Tensorflow. And then Ubuntu devs will pull these Debian packages into Ubuntu devel. As for other distros I'm afraid I can provide no info.

1 must be in the roadmap.
2 is a bit complicated ....

body:
I'm sure that Debian will have at least `CUDA7.5+` and `Caffe` officially in this year (before or within Q2) but not sure for `Tensorflow`. And then Ubuntu devs will pull these Debian packages into Ubuntu devel. As for other distros I'm afraid I can provide no info.

`1` must be in the roadmap. 
`2` is a bit complicated ....
